effect: Does not prevent regular KOs from full [HP]{mechanic:hp}.
Does not absorb non-damaging [Electric]{type:electric} moves, i.e. [Thunder Wave]{move:thunder-wave}.
Triggers on every hit of multiple-hit moves.
[Will-O-Wisp]{move:will-o-wisp} does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to [burns]{mechanic:burn}.
Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage.
[Fire Fang]{move:fire-fang} and moves that inflict [typeless damage]{mechanic:typeless damage} ignore this ability regardless of type.
Cannot influence the natures of Pokémon encountered by interacting with them on the overworld.
Passes back bad [poison]{mechanic:poison} as regular poison.

Does not affect non-damaging [Electric]{type:electric} moves, i.e. [Thunder Wave]{move:thunder-wave}.  Increases the frequency of Match Call calls on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
Redirects [Electric]{type:electric} moves without negating them or granting any [Special Attack]{mechanic:special attack} boost.  Does not redirect [Hidden Power]{move:hidden-power}.
Prevents [Heal Bell]{move:heal-bell} from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon.  This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
Doubles [Cut]{move:cut}'s grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
[Poison]{mechanic:poison} still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the [Speed]{mechanic:speed} cut is unaffected.
Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through [Detect]{move:detect} or [Protect]{move:protect}.
[Rest]{move:rest} works as usual during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong sunlight}.
Redirects [Water]{type:water} moves without negating them or granting any [Special Attack]{mechanic:special attack} boost.  Does not redirect [Hidden Power]{move:hidden-power}.
